BLAZING FRUITS HD
-------------------

Reels UK:
0) infobar -        	                   
1) balance, total bet, win       ArmWrestler 43; color white  			
2) stop autoplay/bet		 ArmWrestler 40; color black 	
                                                                                              


UK Megaspin:
3) autoplay_popup		 ArmWrestler 93; color white	 

4) megaspin 1 (play/for)         ArmWrestler 40; color black		
       stop auto/bet 		 ArmWrestler 40; color black		

5) megaspin 2 (play/for)	 ArmWrestler 40; color black				
       remaining 				



Gamblescreen:
6) bank/double to 		ArmWrestler 38; color white	
7) infobar  	              		


Paytable:
8) wins normal			ArmWrestler 38; color R: 255 G: 237 B: 189
    wins over		        ArmWrestler 38; color white



Bonus:
9) picked -      Swis721 BlkCn BT 54; color R: 254 G: 224 B: 32                                                   

10) missed -      Swis721 BlkCn BT 54; color R: 232 G: 232 B: 232                                            

11) bonus win -   Swis721 BlkCn BT 61; color R: 232 G: 232 B: 232   

12) bonus dialog (bonus_win.png)-   Swis721 BlkCn BT 244; color white      



Help:

14) 1st page bottom text          Calibri Bold 25; color white
